mapper.select: SELECT uat.id, uat.name, t.status, t.ctime, t.score, t.project_id, t.accept, t.id memberTaskId, IFNULL(t.redo_time,"") redo_time FROM uhoem_accept_task uat JOIN uhoem_accept_member_task t ON uat.id = t.task_id WHERE t.member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT uan.id, uan.task_id, uan.name, mn.status FROM uhoem_accept_node uan JOIN uhoem_accept_member_node mn ON uan.`id` = mn.`node_id` WHERE mn.`member_id` = #{memberId} AND uan.task_id = #{taskId}
SELECT uamn.id, uamn.task_id, uamn.node_id, uamn.member_id, uamn.status FROM uhoem_accept_member_node uamn WHERE uamn.task_id = #{taskId} AND uamn.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO uhoem_accept_member_task uamt ( task_id, member_id, status, ctime ) VALUES ( #{taskId}, #{memberId}, #{status}, #{ctime} )
mapper.select: SELECT uep.`projectname`, xo.`address`, xo.`area_name` FROM uhoem_erp_project uep JOIN xx_order xo ON uep.`orderid` = xo.`id` WHERE uep.`autoId` = #{project_id}
SELECT b.`RealName` FROM uhoem_erp_baseuser b WHERE b.`UserId` = #{user_id} AND b.`UserType` = 3
